Software Engineer

Hi, welcome to my portfolio website. I am currently a software engineer residing in Tampa, Florida. I recieved my bachelors in Computer Science from Boston University in May of 2018. I have been working at PwC as a software engineer from 2019. I primarly work with .Net Core, React/Redux and Kafka in PwC.
About Me:
Riken
Software Engineer
Location: Ready to move
Education: Boston University, May 2018
Major: Computer Science

Track Metro: An ios app where you can favorite a station from LA metro and recieve a push notification when you reach near the said favorite station with the latest time. App uses iOS geo-fence to track if user is nearby the station.
Stack: .Net Core backend hosted in DigitalOcean Droplet (Ubuntu VPS) through Nginx. Native Swift iOS App. No database but I do cache all the request to the API for 16 seconds in the memory itself so that the API does not overload "LA Metro's API". I also cache the time in the iOS App itself for 16 seconds.

Y2Y Mobile: An android app, for Y2Y home Shelter, to gather information about their guests' stay in the home shelter. Guest can even look at their To-do List and events.
Stack: Node Express backend hosted in Heroku. Native Java Android App. Salesforce for the database.

Barcode Price: An iOS app that would scan Barcode and give you MSRP of the product. We consume Walmart open API to get the information and store it in the Coredata as the history object.

PwC Assurance Digital: Led a team to make PwC internal Assurance Digital website. Sadly, I won't be able to show it here as I do not own the copyright for the project.
